name: discord-bot-client
description: Discord Bot Client - login into discord with a bot token

scripts.build: electron-builder build --linux 7z zip tar.xz tar.lz tar.gz tar.bz2 dir appImage snap deb rpm freebsd pacman p5p apk --windows 7z zip tar.xz tar.lz tar.gz tar.bz2 dir nsis nsis-web portable appx squirrelWindows --macos 7z zip tar.xz tar.lz tar.gz tar.bz2 dir dmg pkg mas mas-dev --x64 --ia32 --armv7l --arm64 --dir
